variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject identifier [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: CONTACT OCCASION [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: MHXA1
variable.description: Q1. A. Sleep. Told you snore loudly and bother others while sleep [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA2
variable.description: Q2. A. Sleep. Told that you stop breathing in your sleep [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA3
variable.description: Q3. A. Sleep. Fall asleep during the day particular when not busy [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA4
variable.description: Q4. A. Sleep. You are tired after sleeping [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA5
variable.description: Q5. A. Sleep. You feel sleepy or fall asleep while driving [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA6
variable.description: Q6. A. Sleep. During last month how would you rate sleep quality overall? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA7
variable.description: Q7. A. Sleep. During the past month, excluding naps, how many hours of actual sleep did you get at night (or day, if you work at night) on average (Hours)? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA8
variable.description: Q8. B. Chest pain on effort. Have you ever had any pain or discomfort in chest? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA9
variable.description: Q9. B. Chest pain on effort. Do you get it when you walk uphill or hurry? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA10
variable.description: Q10. B. Chest pain on effort. Chest pain walking at ordinary pace on level? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA11
variable.description: Q11. B. Chest pain on effort. What do you do if you get chest pain while walking? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA12
variable.description: Q12. B. Chest pain on effort. If you stand still, what happens? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA13
variable.description: Q13. B. Chest pain on effort. Time required for relief of chest pain [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA14A
variable.description: Q14a. B. Chest pain on effort. Pain location-sternum (upper or middle)? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA14B
variable.description: Q14b. B. Chest pain on effort. Pain location-sternum (lower)? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA14C
variable.description: Q14c. B. Chest pain on effort. Pain location-left anterior chest? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA14D
variable.description: Q14d. B. Chest pain on effort. Pain location-left arm? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA14E
variable.description: Q14e. B. Chest pain on effort. Pain location-other? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA15
variable.description: Q15. B. Chest pain on effort. Do you feel chest pain anywhere else? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA16
variable.description: Q16. B. Chest pain on effort. Saw a doctor because of chest pain? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA17
variable.description: Q17. B. Chest pain on effort. What did the doctor say it was? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA18
variable.description: Q18. B. Chest pain on effort. Hospitalized because of chest pain? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA19
variable.description: Q19. B. Chest pain on effort. How long ago did chest pain start? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA20
variable.description: Q20. B. Chest pain on effort. Within past 2 months, has your chest pain occurred more often? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA21
variable.description: Q21. B. Chest pain on effort. Occurred at least twice as often as before? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA22
variable.description: Q22. B. Chest pain on effort. Has the pain more severe in the past 2 months? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA23
variable.description: Q23. B. Chest pain on effort. Has the pain lasted longer when it occurs within the past 2 months? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA24
variable.description: Q24. B. Chest pain on effort. Do you use nitroglycerin to relieve the pain? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA25
variable.description: Q25. B. Chest pain on effort. Needed more nitroglycerin in past 2 months? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA26
variable.description: Q26. B. Chest pain on effort. Get pain with less exertion in past 2 months? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA27
variable.description: Q27. B. Chest pain on effort. In the past 2 months, have you started getting more pain when sitting still? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA28
variable.description: Q28. B. Chest pain on effort. Pain when sleeping in past 2 months? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA29
variable.description: Q29. C. Possible infraction. Ever had severe pain lasting for half an hour or more across the front of chest? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA30
variable.description: Q30. C. Possible infraction. Saw a doctor because of this pain [pain lasting for half an hour or more across the front of chest]? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA31
variable.description: Q31. C. Possible infraction. What did the doctor say it was [pain lasting for half an hour or more across the front of chest]? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA32
variable.description: Q32. C. Possible infraction. Have you ever had a heart attack for which you were hospitalized one week or more? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA33
variable.description: Q33. C. Possible infraction. How many such heart attacks have you had? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA34
variable.description: Q34. C. Possible infraction. Age when first heart attack. [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA35
variable.description: Q35. C. Possible infraction. Have you had a test in which you were asked to exercise while an electrocardiogram was taken? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA36
variable.description: Q36. C. Possible infraction. Told results [were asked to exercise while an electrocardiogram was taken] (normal or abnormal?) [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA37
variable.description: Q37. D. Intermittent claudication. Pain in either leg on walking? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA38
variable.description: Q38. D. Intermittent claudication. Does this pain ever begin when standing still or sitting? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA39
variable.description: Q39. D. Intermittent claudication. What part of leg do you feel it [pain ever begin when standing still or sitting]? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA40
variable.description: Q40. D. Intermittent claudication. Pain when walking uphill or hurry? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA41
variable.description: Q41. D. Intermittent claudication. Pain if you walk at ordinary pace? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA42
variable.description: Q42. D. Intermittent claudication. Pain disappear while walking? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA43
variable.description: Q43. D. Intermittent claudication. What do you do if get pain while walking? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA44
variable.description: Q44. D. Intermittent claudication. If you stand still, what happens? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA45
variable.description: Q45. D. Intermittent claudication. How soon came relief of pain? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA46
variable.description: Q46. D. Intermittent claudication. Hospitalized for problem in legs? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA47
variable.description: Q47. E. Congestive heart failure. Ever had to sleep on 2 or more pillows to help breathe? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA48
variable.description: Q48. E. Congestive heart failure. Ever awakened by trouble breathing? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA49
variable.description: Q49. E. Congestive heart failure. Ever had swelling of feet or ankles? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA50
variable.description: Q50. E. Congestive heart failure. Swelling come during day, go down overnight? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA51
variable.description: Q51. F. Invasive procedures. Ever had surgery on heart, arteries of neck or legs? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.description: Q52a. F. Invasive procedures. Did you have a coronary bypass? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.description: Q52d. F. Invasive procedures. Site of carotid endarterectomy? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.description: Q52e1. F. Invasive procedures. Had other revascularization or bypass? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA52F
variable.description: Q52ef. F. Invasive procedures. Other surgery on heart, arteries? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA53
variable.description: Q53. F. Invasive procedures. Ever had balloon angioplasty on arteries? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.description: Q54a. F. Invasive procedures. Ever had angioplasty of coronary arteries? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA54B
variable.description: Q54b. F. Invasive procedures. Ever had angioplasty in arteries of neck? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA54C
variable.description: Q54c. F. Invasive procedures. Ever had angioplasty of lower extremity? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA55A
variable.description: Q55a. F. Invasive procedures. Ever had heart catheterization? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA55B
variable.description: Q55b. F. Invasive procedures. Ever had carotid artery catheterization? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXA55C1
variable.description: Q55c1. F. Invasive procedures. Other arterial catheterization? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.description: Q56a. G. Diagnostic procedures. Ever had echocardiogram? [Visit 1] [Medical History Form, MHX]
